name: Titanium.UI.iOS.PreviewActionGroup
summary: A PreviewActionGroup provides options to configure a group of actions used by the iOS9 3D-Touch feature "Peek and Pop".

properties.name: actions
properties.summary: The preview actions assigned to this preview action group.
properties.description: Provides an array with elements of the type Titanium.UI.iOS.PreviewAction. Note: Apple does not allow adding a preview group to another preview group, so only one hirarchie level is allowed.

properties.name: title
properties.description: Provides a title to be shown when "peeking" a view referenced in the Titanium.UI.iOS.PreviewContext.
